# Language models 

## [Facebook bart-large-cnn](https://huggingface.co/facebook/bart-large-cnn) sequence-to-sequence model trained to summarise policy positions from party press releases
   - [z-dickson/bart-large-cnn-climate-change-summarization](https://huggingface.co/z-dickson/bart-large-cnn-climate-change-summarization)

## [Bert-base-multilingual-cased](https://huggingface.co/bert-base-multilingual-cased) Sentiment model trained on Polish, English, Spanish, Dutch and German Newspaper headlines.
   - [z-dickson/multilingual_sentiment_newspaper_headlines](https://huggingface.co/z-dickson/multilingual_sentiment_newspaper_headlines)
   
<img src="assets/attention_to_borders_newspapers.png" alt="drawing" width="700" class="center"/>

---


## [Vinai/bertweet-large](https://huggingface.co/vinai/bertweet-large) model trained to predict opposition to COVID-19 policies from US congressmembers' tweets 
   -  [z-dickson/US_politicians_covid_skepticism](https://huggingface.co/z-dickson/US_politicians_covid_skepticism)

<img src="assets/infected_timeseries.png" alt="drawing" width="700" class="center"/>

---
   
## [Bert-base-multilingual-cased](https://huggingface.co/bert-base-multilingual-cased) trained to predict the [CAP issue codes](https://www.comparativeagendas.net/pages/master-codebook) of political text (i.e. bills, speeches, tweets etc.)
   - [z-dickson/CAP_multilingual](https://huggingface.co/z-dickson/CAP_multilingual)
